content: this is the next in the long list of pokemon that a customer of mine on etsy has requested at first he ordered just the complete version of zygarde when he found out that there are four stages of zygarde cores and cells 10% complete 50% complete and 100% complete this is the pattern for the both versions of the zygarde cores and cells this pattern includes the color lists for both zygarde cores and cells and shiny zygarde cores and cells materials worsted weight yarn shiny alternative in parenthesizes spring green jade rose red medium thyme teal white and black e crochet hook polyester fiberfill yarn needle
